publications.name: BPFNN: Bayesian Probabilistic Fuzzy Neural Networks for Uncertainty-Aware Clustering and Probabilistic Fuzzy Reasoning
publications.summary: Early Access (Oct 2025). Bayesian probabilistic fuzzy neural network (BPFNN) for uncertainty-aware clustering and probabilistic fuzzy reasoning; integrates BPFCM with MCMC-based posterior inference.

publications.name: Robust Classification via Interval Type-2 Fuzzy C-Means and Gradient Boosting
publications.summary: Vol. 33, No. 9, pp. 3103–3117 (Sep 2025). Robust classification via interval type-2 fuzzy C-means (IT2FCM) combined with gradient boosting.

publications.name: Reinforced Fuzzy-Rule-Based Neural Networks Realized Through Streamlined Feature Selection Strategy and Fuzzy Clustering With Distance Variation
publications.summary: Vol. 32, No. 10, pp. 5674–5686 (Oct 2024). FRNNs with streamlined feature selection (correlation/determination-coefficient based) and fuzzy clustering with distance variation for high-dimensional data.

publications.name: Design of Tobacco Leaves Classifier Through Fuzzy Clustering-Based Neural Networks With Multiple Histogram Analyses of Images
publications.summary: Vol. 20, No. 3, pp. 4698–4709 (Mar 2024). Tobacco leaf quality classification using multi-color-space histogram analyses and fuzzy clustering-based neural networks.

publications.name: Design of Iterative Fuzzy Radial Basis Function Neural Networks Based on Iterative Weighted Fuzzy C-Means Clustering and Weighted LSE Estimation
publications.summary: Vol. 30, No. 10, pp. 4273–4285 (Oct 2022). Iterative fuzzy RBFNN design via iterative weighted FCM clustering and weighted least-squares estimation.
